fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ConsumerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message reading, disposal, and error handling scenarios.
recommendations: Consider adding more detailed error logging in readMessage method
Implement a more robust cancellation token strategy
Add configuration options for timeout duration
keyImprovements: Null config and topic name handling
fileReports.note: Tests use Moq for mocking and FluentAssertions for more readable assertions. Ensure Confluent.Kafka dependencies are properly configured.

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ProducerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message production, error handling, and disposal scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding more robust error handling in writeMessage method
Implement logging instead of Console.WriteLine for better testability
Add configuration options for timeout and retry mechanisms
fileReports.note: Tests simulate Kafka interactions but do not connect to actual Kafka broker. Integration tests would require a running Kafka instance.

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for OrderController covering happy path, model validation, serialization, and error scenarios

keyImprovements: Added test for valid order request
fileReports.note: Tests assume basic OrderRequest model with CustomerId, ProductId, and Quantity properties
